content.description: In a certain game, the integer variable bonus is assigned a value based on the value of the integer variable score.
content.question: If score is greater than 100, bonus is assigned a value that is 10 times score. If score is between 50 and 100 inclusive, bonus is assigned the value of score. If score is less than 50, bonus is assigned a value of 0. Which of the following code segments assigns bonus correctly for all possible integer values of score ? Select two answers.

choices.label: IF(score > 100){bonus <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> score * 10}ELSE{IF(score ≥ 50){bonus <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> score}ELSE{bonus <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 0}}

IF(score ≥ 50){IF(score > 100){bonus <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> score * 10}ELSE{bonus <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 0}}ELSE{bonus <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> score}

IF(score < 50){bonus <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 0}ELSE{IF(score ≥ 50){bonus <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> score}ELSE{bonus <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> score * 10}}

IF(score < 50){bonus <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 0}ELSE{IF(score > 100){bonus <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> score * 10}ELSE{bonus <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> score}}

content.answer: IF(score > 100){bonus <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> score * 10}ELSE{IF(score ≥ 50){bonus <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> score}ELSE{bonus <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 0}}

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Implement and apply an algorithm.
